title: Arcade Event, Orb Question(Time)
body:
Hey Guys, so I have a question , if I buy a "Great Orb", and I keep it, can I use it after the Arcade Event ends?
Like for example can I save it and use it when the new star guardian skins come out?

replies.body: So far, the tickets you can accumulate through the event will expire on 9/11/17, but it doesn't seem like the orbs themselves will expire. Just to safe, however, I would make sure to use them before the event ends.
OMG We've thought the same thing! xD i would like to get an answer aswell, i need those sweet star guardians ♥-♥
Ahahah yea, but it wasnt me the one who thought of that it was a dear friend of mine xDD
Thanks guys, I appreciate the help.
That said, since the loot is set to expire on the 11th of September, the skins will highly likely already be out by then, so your plan should not have any hitches.
